languages.text: "Воистину милостив! Да хранит Он нас от ереси в помыслах и деяниях".

traits.locale_text: "Воистину милостив! Да хранит Он нас от ереси в помыслах и деяниях".

languages.text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."
languages.original_text: "Воистину милостив! Да хранит Он нас от ереси в помыслах и деяниях".

traits.locale_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."
"He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."
"He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."
"He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."
"He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."
"He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

languages.text: “帝皇确实仁慈！愿祂保佑我们远离异端思想与亵渎行为。”
languages.original_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇确实仁慈！愿祂保佑我们原理异端思想与亵渎行为。”

languages.text: 「あの方は常に、情けをくださる！私たちの思想と行いを異端からお守りください！」
languages.original_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

traits.locale_text: 「あの方は常に、情けをくださる！私たちの思想と行いを異端からお守りください！」

languages.text: «¡Es misericordioso! Que nos proteja de la herejía en pensamiento y obra».
languages.original_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es misericordioso! Que nos proteja de la herejía en pensamiento y obra».

languages.text: "Er ist wahrlich gnadenvoll! Möge er uns vor Ketzerei in Gedanke und Tat bewahren."
languages.original_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist wahrlich gnadenvoll! Möge er uns vor Ketzerei in Gedanke und Tat bewahren."

languages.text: « Sa miséricorde est sans limites ! Qu'Il nous protège de l'hérésie, aussi bien dans nos pensées que dans nos actes ! »
languages.original_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

traits.locale_text: « Sa miséricorde est sans limites ! Qu'Il nous protège de l'hérésie, aussi bien dans nos pensées que dans nos actes ! »

languages.text: "O gerçekten de merhametli olandır! Düşüncelerimizi de eylemlerimizi de kâfirlikten korusun."
languages.original_text: "He is merciful indeed! May He protect us from heresy in thought and deed."

traits.locale_text: "O gerçekten de merhametli olandır! Düşüncelerimizi de eylemlerimizi de kâfirlikten korusun."
